title: Check if a number is positive, negative or zero
body:
```javascript
console.log(Math.sign(20)); // 1

console.log(Math.sign(-20)); // -1

console.log(Math.sign(0)); // 0

console.log(Math.sign(-0)); //  -0

console.log(Math.sign('-20')); // -1

console.log(Math.sign('hello')); // NaN

console.log(Math.sign(NaN)); // NaN
```
